data.text: @rwdmto @SharkawyMD Out of curiosity, why do you have a preference?  What’s your rationale?
@SharkawyMD Awesome!!!! 😄😄👍🏼👍🏼
@SharkawyMD Thank you. Honestly Im hoping for the Moderna one.
@smiley37555 My pleasure 😊
@K7740 @SharkawyMD He replied @K7740
@SharkawyMD Ok thank you so much and Happy New Year to you and your family 🥳🎉🎶🎆😷

@SharkawyMD Happy New Year to you and your family Dr. Sharkawy. Thank you so much for all your efforts, for the care and love that you give selflessly to your patients, for sharing your thoughts, concerns, advice, hope, and for being a voice of reason and humour :)
@smiley37555 @SharkawyMD I'd like to know as well. Immune compromised and have had anaphyllactic drug reactions....

@smiley37555 Those with compromised immune systems are in greatest need of the vaccines. Severity of penicillin/environmental allergy does not correlate with reaction to vaccines whatsoever. Reaction is due to excipients (PEG, stabilizers, etc.)

@rwdmto @SharkawyMD Federal gov't ordered 40m doses of Moderna vaccine, so a good chance we'll be offered it, eventually.  Other vaccines with big Fed orders are Novavax, and to a lesser extent J&J, AZ.

@rwdmto @SharkawyMD Also people should note that AZ study has sone fundamental issues: the dosage is not totally clear and what the final efficacy is. Until @US_FDA approves AZ the AZ status won't be clear as AZ needs to provide extra trial results for US regulators, it seems.
@SharkawyMD @rwdmto Out of the vaccines you mentioned as well as the two we have approved what vaccine would you have taken if you had a choice from your knowledge of them?

@rwdmto @SharkawyMD At this point there is a slim chance that Pfizer vaccine will be available to general public due to logistics and operational obstacles though Canada can exercise an extra order of 56 million doses.

@rwdmto @SharkawyMD If general public ends up being inoculated in pharmacies and dr offices then there is a high chance that they will be done by AZ vaccine or similar J&J that can be stored in regular freezers. Depending on the supply Moderna vaccine is the best one if becomes publicaly available.
@SharkawyMD Dr could i ask, what is this going to be like for ppl with compromised immune systems? Plus ppl with penicillin allergies with anaphylaxis shock???
@rwdmto Difficult to say until we have a better idea on supply of new additions like AZ and Johnson and Johnson.
@SharkawyMD Let’s do this 💉
@SharkawyMD All the best to you and your family, Dr. S!!  Thanks for all you do. https://t.co/vCnYp6Tx0v
@SharkawyMD @SharkawyMD what are the odds the general population will have a choice of which vaccine to get?
@SharkawyMD Thank you for your guidance during these challenging times. This is great news to read on the last day of 2020. Stay safe and be well. https://t.co/kyzrs089Ox
@SharkawyMD What happened to the vaccines today doesn’t look like to many given out. Slow moving.
@SharkawyMD The best news of 2020
@SharkawyMD Merci.
